sentences.english: IT poured runing water all over my painting, and ruined it.
sentences.chinese: 她把水全倒在了我的画上，把画毁了。

sentences.english: The year before, 2, 295 square kilometers (1, 426 square miles) were destroyed over that time period.
sentences.chinese: 在上一个年度，有2295平方公里的森林被毁。

sentences.english: He died in his late thirties as he ruined his constitution by drink and dissipation.
sentences.chinese: 他不到四十岁就死了，花天酒地的生活毁了他的身体。

sentences.english: Workers built shelters for survivors whose homes had been destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 救援人员为那些家园被毁的幸存者盖起了避难所。

sentences.english: Eg. She poured water all over my painting, and ruined it.
sentences.chinese: 她把水全倒在我的画上，把画毁了。

sentences.english: Steinbeck wrote furiously and said that the effort nearly destroyed him.
sentences.chinese: 斯坦贝克愤怒地写，并说写作几乎毁了他。

sentences.english: Stink bugs have destroyed her entire grape harvest.
sentences.chinese: 她种植的葡萄几乎全部毁于椿象。

sentences.english: So we lost nearly all the houses there.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我们几乎所有的房子都被毁了。

sentences.english: The monster had all but wrecked the ship.
sentences.chinese: 那妖物差一点毁了这条船。

sentences.english: I dreamed that Thornfield was totally destroyed, just a heap of stones.
sentences.chinese: 我梦见特恩费得全被毁了，只剩下一堆石头。

sentences.english: They were thoroughly rousted out and their camps were destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 他们被彻底撵出来了，营地也被毁了。
眀信片老是毁了我的假期。

sentences.english: More than 80,000 people were killed and dozens of towns destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 超过8万人殒命，数十座城镇被毁。

sentences.english: The dinner spoiled because he put the stove on too high.
sentences.chinese: 这顿饭算是给毁了，因为他把烤炉的温度调得太高了。

sentences.english: It is also wrong to destory the lives of our families for mistakes that we have made.
sentences.chinese: 我们不该为了咱们的错误而毁了家人的生活。

sentences.english: Termites have eaten the posts and mined the fence.
sentences.chinese: 白蚁蛀坏木柱，毁了栅栏。
